LLM#

LLM integration via litellm.

Client#

class papercutter.llm.client.LLMResponse[source]#

Response from LLM.

content: str#
model: str#
input_tokens: int#
output_tokens: int#
__init__(content, model, input_tokens, output_tokens)#
Parameters:

  • content (str)

  • model (str)

  • input_tokens (int)

  • output_tokens (int)

Return type:

None

class papercutter.llm.client.LLMClient[source]#

Wrapper around litellm for LLM calls.

Supports multiple providers through litellm: - Anthropic (claude-sonnet-4-20250514, etc.) - OpenAI (gpt-4o, etc.) - Others supported by litellm

DEFAULT_MODEL = 'claude-sonnet-4-20250514'#
__init__(api_key=None, model=None)[source]#

Initialize the LLM client.

Parameters:

  • api_key (Optional[str]) – API key (defaults to env var).

  • model (Optional[str]) – Model to use (defaults to env var or claude-sonnet-4-20250514).

is_available()[source]#

Check if LLM features are available.

Return type:

bool

complete(prompt, system=None, max_tokens=4096, temperature=0.3)[source]#

Send a completion request to the LLM.

Parameters:

  • prompt (str) – The user prompt.

  • system (Optional[str]) – Optional system prompt.

  • max_tokens (int) – Maximum tokens in response.

  • temperature (float) – Sampling temperature.

Return type:

LLMResponse

Returns:

LLMResponse with the completion.

Raises:

  • LLMNotAvailableError – If LLM is not configured.

  • LLMError – If the LLM call fails.

stream(prompt, system=None, max_tokens=4096, temperature=0.3)[source]#

Stream a completion response from the LLM.

Parameters:

  • prompt (str) – The user prompt.

  • system (Optional[str]) – Optional system prompt.

  • max_tokens (int) – Maximum tokens in response.

  • temperature (float) – Sampling temperature.

Yields:

String chunks of the response.

Raises:

  • LLMNotAvailableError – If LLM is not configured.

  • LLMError – If the LLM call fails.

papercutter.llm.client.get_client(api_key=None, model=None)[source]#

Get or create the LLM client.

Parameters:

  • api_key (Optional[str]) – Optional API key override.

  • model (Optional[str]) – Optional model override.

Return type:

LLMClient

Returns:

LLMClient instance.

Prompts#

Prompt templates for LLM-powered features.

Templates are loaded lazily from external files to reduce memory usage.

papercutter.llm.prompts.get_summarize_prompt(content, focus=None, length='default')[source]#

Get the appropriate summarize prompt.

Return type:

tuple[str, str]

Parameters:

  • content (str)

  • focus (str | None)

  • length (str)
